title: Fork, 1886
markings: On tubular handle: lion passant, Queen Victoria's head, date letter: L, and maker's mark: a butterfly-like symbol with an R and an S stamped in what would be the wings. On fork: lion passant, leopard's head for London, date letter: L, also same maker's mark.
dimensions: cm: L: 12 x W: 4.8 x D: 1
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Three-tine square fork pivots horizontally on a tubular handle chased with two rounded bands.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, 1886.
1886. silver. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-64-18.
